summary: TAKATA RECALL  HAVE CALLED THE LOCAL DEALER TWICE SINCE GETTING THE LETTER OVER A MONTH AGO.  SAME RESPONSE BOTH TIMES:  "WE DON'T HAVE THE PARTS, AND WE DON'T KNOW IF OR WHEN THEY WILL COME ION.  PLEASE CALL BACK IN TWO WEEKS."  UNACCEPTABLE ANSWER.    MY SON DRIVES THIS TRUCK EVERY DAY TO/FROM SCHOOL, PERSONAL, AND CHURCH ACTIVITIES.    MY SON'S LIFE (AND ANY PASSENGER HE MIGHT HAVE) LIVES ARE IN DANGER, AND FORD, CONTRARY TO THE STATEMENT IN THE RECALL LETTER, IS NOT PROVIDING PARTS IN A TIMELY MANNER.  I AM HOLDING FORD CRIMINALLY AND CIVILLY RESPONSIBLE FOR THIS NEGLECT SHOULD ANY INJURY OCCUR RELATED TO THIS PROBLEM
